custom-action.name: imported_Expand GuiShell (SAP.TableTreeContro...- SM21 - system log)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates an expand action on an SAP tree object.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/". - nodeKey (optional): The node key of a tree. - nodeLabel (optional): To identify a tree node via its label. - indexes (optional): The indexes separated by "/" to reference a tree path. Example: 0/1/1/2. - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
